text: The community of Irish people in Japan is estimated to constitute 1,000–2,000 people.各国・地域情勢：アイルランドConsular support for Irish with relatives in Japan ==Notable people== * Shane Berkery * Matt Heafy * Francis Brinkley * Robert Cullen * Lafcadio Hearn * Colin Killoran * Niall Killoran * Anna Tsuchiya * Naoise Ó Baoill * Sowelu ==See also== * Ireland–Japan relations ==References== Category:European diaspora in Japan Japan
title: Irish people in Japan
